scripts.build:wasm: GOOS=js GOARCH=wasm go build -C .. -o frontend/public/msgclient.wasm services/messages/cmd/msgwasm
scripts.prepare:wasm: sh -c 'set -eu; mkdir -p public; GO_WASM="$(go env GOROOT)/misc/wasm/wasm_exec.js"; if [ ! -f "$GO_WASM" ]; then GO_WASM="$(go env GOROOT)/lib/wasm/wasm_exec.js"; fi; cp "$GO_WASM" public/wasm_exec.js'
